yin:description.yin:text: Defines the properties associated with peer 128T routers. The peer may be another router in the same authority or a router in a different authority
A string identifier for a peer, which uses alphanumerics, underscores, dots, or dashes, and cannot exceed 253 characters.

yin:error-message.yin:value: Must contain only alphanumeric characters or any of the following: - _ . (e.g., MyFirst-128T-Router).

yin:description.yin:text: An arbitrary name that represents the properties associated with the peer router. Typically this will be the name of the authority or the value of the name field in the peer's router configuration.
Qualified Service Name in the form: tenant[.authority][/[service-group/]service]

yin:error-message.yin:value: Must contain only alphanumeric characters or any of the following: / . _ - Required format: 'Tenant[.Authority[/ServiceGroup[/Service]]]'. No forward slash-delimited segment can exceed 62 characters.(e.g., Engineering.Authority128/Video/private_conferencing).

yin:description.yin:text: Qualified service names to include from peer router.
